name: Django Common Errors
description: Common errors encountered in Django applications

rules.description: Django cannot import the settings module
rules.suggestion: Ensure that the settings module exists and is in your PYTHONPATH

rules.pattern: django.db.migrations.exceptions.NodeNotFoundError: Node '([^']*)' from migration '([^']*)' in ([^']*) not found
rules.suggestion: Run 'python manage.py makemigrations' to create missing migrations
examples: django.db.migrations.exceptions.NodeNotFoundError: Node '0001_initial' from migration '0002_auto_20200101_0000' in app1 not found

rules.suggestion: Check the template directory and create the missing template file

rules.pattern: django.core.exceptions.FieldError: Cannot resolve keyword '([^']*)' into field
rules.description: Invalid field name used in a query
rules.suggestion: Check the model definition for the correct field name
examples: django.core.exceptions.FieldError: Cannot resolve keyword 'name' into field

rules.description: User does not have permission to perform the action
rules.suggestion: Check user permissions or adjust the permission requirements
examples: django.core.exceptions.PermissionDenied: You don't have permission to view this object
